Countries

Source: R/countries.R
countries.Rd

Country codes, names, UN major areas and UNHCR regional bureaux/operations.

Usage

countries

Format

A tibble.

iso_code

ISO3 Country code.

unhcr_code

UNHCR Country code.

name

UNSD Name.

unhcr_region

UNHCR Region name.

unsd_region

UNSD Region name.

unsd_subregion

UNSD Sub-region name.

unsd_imregion

SDG Region name.

sdg_region

SDG Region name.

Source

UNHCR Refugee Data Finder.

Examples

countries
#> # A tibble: 232 × 7
#>    iso_code unhcr_code name              unhcr_region unsd_region unsd_subregion
#>    <chr>    <chr>      <chr>             <chr>        <chr>       <chr>         
#>  1 AFG      AFG        Afghanistan       Asia and th… Asia        Southern Asia 
#>  2 ALB      ALB        Albania           Europe       Europe      Southern Euro…
#>  3 DZA      ALG        Algeria           Middle East… Africa      Northern Afri…
#>  4 AND      AND        Andorra           Europe       Europe      Southern Euro…
#>  5 AGO      ANG        Angola            Southern Af… Africa      Sub-Saharan A…
#>  6 AIA      AIA        Anguilla          The Americas Americas    Latin America…
#>  7 ATG      ANT        Antigua and Barb… The Americas Americas    Latin America…
#>  8 ARG      ARG        Argentina         The Americas Americas    Latin America…
#>  9 ARM      ARM        Armenia           Europe       Asia        Western Asia  
#> 10 ABW      ABW        Aruba             The Americas Americas    Latin America…
#> # ℹ 222 more rows
#> # ℹ 1 more variable: unsd_imregion <chr>
